items.title: Nvidia and Google launch the GeForce Now Fast Pass to let Chromebook owners stream over 2,000 games directly from an existing PC game library without ads (Dominic Preston/The Verge)
items.summary:
Dominic Preston / The Verge:
Nvidia and Google launch the GeForce Now Fast Pass to let Chromebook owners stream over 2,000 games directly from an existing PC game library without ads  —  It's an ad-free queue-jump for GeForce Now's free tier. … Nvidia has partnered with Google to launch a new cloud gaming plan exclusive to Chromebooks.

items.title: Lula taps Brazil's solicitor general for Supreme Court seat
items.summary: RIO DE JANEIRO (Reuters) -Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has appointed Solicitor General Jorge Messias to fill a vacancy on the Supreme Court, the government said in a Thursday statement. Read full story

items.title: Blue Origin reveals a super-heavy variant of its New Glenn rocket that is taller than a Saturn V
items.summary: The nine-engine variant can carry larger payloads and more closely matches the capabilities of SpaceX's largest rocket, Starship.

items.title: Letterboxd to launch new movie rental feature in December

items.title: Gemini starts rolling out to Android Auto globally
items.summary: Gemini will replace Google Assistant and give drivers the ability to make playlists, access email, and learn about a city — all through voice.

items.title: New Chromebooks will come with a year of Nvidia’s cloud gaming ‘fast pass’
items.summary: Nvidia has partnered with Google to launch a new cloud gaming plan exclusive to Chromebooks. GeForce Now Fast Pass will allow Chromebook owners to stream over 2,000 games directly from an existing PC game library without ads, and new Chromebook purchases will include a year’s membership for free. Fast Pass looks similar to GeForce Now’s […]

items.title: Google’s Gemini is now on Android Auto
items.summary: Move over Google Assistant, there’s a new robot to yell at while driving. Starting today, Google is rolling out its Gemini AI assistant to Android Auto users, allowing drivers access to a “truly conversational” voice assistant who can help with directions, messages, and errands. With Gemini, “you can just speak naturally, have a back and […]

items.title: As Windows turns 40, Microsoft faces an AI backlash
items.summary: It feels like Microsoft is blindly racing toward another Windows 8 situation. Windows 8 was arguably the most divisive release of Windows in its 40-year history, as Microsoft attempted to overhaul the operating system for a touch-first future. Spooked by the iPad, the company shipped a radical overhaul that ditched the familiar Start menu and […]

items.title: Nigerian court jails separatist leader Kanu for life over terrorism
items.summary: ABUJA (Reuters) -A Nigerian court on Thursday sentenced separatist leader Nnamdi Kanu to life in prison after convicting him on all seven terrorism-related charges at the end of a decade-long trial that has inflamed tensions in the country's southeast. Read full story

items.title: US discussing with South Africa possible participation in G20 summit, Ramaphosa says
items.summary: JOHANNESBURG (Reuters) -South Africa is discussing with the United States the possibility of U.S. participation in the G20 summit after an initial boycott by the Trump administration, President Cyril Ramaphosa said on Thursday. Read full story

items.title: Russian video shows soldiers walking freely through ruins of Ukraine's Pokrovsk
items.summary: MOSCOW (Reuters) -Russia's defence ministry released video on Thursday showing its soldiers moving freely through the southern part of the Ukrainian city of Pokrovsk, patrolling deserted streets lined with charred apartment blocks. Read full story

items.title: Nano Banana Pro is great at following instructions, generates interim "thought images", and makes full infographics with well-rendered text from a short prompt (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)

items.title: The best guide to spotting AI writing comes from Wikipedia
items.summary: Wikipedia's guide to “Signs of AI writing” is a great resource for learning to spot LLM-generated prose.

items.title: As US migration rates drop, life on the San Diego border has changed
items.summary: SAN DIEGO/TIJUANA (Reuters) -A year ago, San Diego trauma surgeon Dr. Vishal Bansal was likely to see dozens of migrants each month who had fallen from the towering wall on the U.S.-Mexico border. Leg and ankle fractures were common, and he also treated spine, pelvic and traumatic brain injuries.  Read full story

items.title: After SEC investigation, Curastory founder resigns, hires replacement
items.summary: Curastory’s founder and CEO, Tiffany Kelly, has resigned from the role and replaced herself with Dave Dickman, former CEO of the influencer marketing platform Tagger.

items.title: Paradromics says it received FDA approval for a human trial of its Connexus brain implant, aimed at restoring speech to those with severe motor impairments (Emily Mullin/Wired)
items.summary:
Emily Mullin / Wired:
Paradromics says it received FDA approval for a human trial of its Connexus brain implant, aimed at restoring speech to those with severe motor impairments  —  The Austin-based startup will test its high-bandwidth device to help restore speech in people with extremely limited movement.

items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has launched the next phase of its ongoing Black Friday Sale with increased savings up to 70% across its power stations, bundles, and accessories, giving us the best prices we have seen all year – complete with free gifts with select purchases and at certain price thresholds. Among the expanded lineup, you can score the latest F3000 Portable Power Station starting solo at $1,199 shipped and coming with a FREE protective cover ($99 value), matching in price over at Amazon, though you won’t get the cover there. This new model has been on the market since June carrying a $2,599 full price tag, which we’ve seen go as low as $1,399 up until today. Now, with its Black Friday event in full gear, you’re getting an additional $200 discount to a new all-time low price, giving you a total $1,499 in savings this holiday season. Head below for the full rundown of deals while they’re around.

more…

This isn’t your typical end-of-season clearance either, the savings include new releases, fresh colorways, and recent drops, along with all the classics. If you’ve been thinking about jumping on board the Crocs trend, now’s the time. Take it all the way and grab some Jibbitz $2 for one $7 for a pack.

Target has now officially released a preview of its upcoming main event Black Friday sale. The retailer previously unveiled some details on its month long event including a complete deal schedule for its early sale, the Deals of the Day, and the official November 27 start time of its main event Black Friday sale. But it has now issued an official press release detailing the upcoming details and when they will go live – the deals are going live this weekend.
